original_text: And the screen for the gate of the court was embroidered with needlework in blue and purple and scarlet yarns and fine twined linen. It was twenty cubits long and five cubits high in its breadth, corresponding to the hangings of the court.
korean_text: 뜰의 휘장 문을 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가늘게 꼰 베 실로 수 놓아 짰으니 길이는 스무 규빗이요 너비와 높이는 뜰의 포장과 같이 다섯 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: And the screen for the gate of the court
in blue and purple and scarlet yarns

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가늘게 꼰 세마 포로 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and five cubits high in its breadth
corresponding to the hangings of the court
